split-vector.title: Split Vector
split-vector.description: An animatable property that is split into individually anaimated components

ti.title: Value In Tangent
ti.description: Tangent for values (eg: moving position around a curved path

to.title: Value Out Tangent
to.description: Tangent for values (eg: moving position around a curved path

value.title: Value
value.description: An animatable property that holds a float

animated-property.title: Multi Dimensional
animated-property.description: An animatable property that holds an array of numbers

multi-dimensional.title: Multi Dimensional
multi-dimensional.description: An animatable property that holds an array of numbers

l.title: Length
l.description:
Number of components in the value arrays.
If present values will be truncated or expanded to match this length when accessed from expressions.

position.title: Position Property
position.description: An animatable property to represent a position in space

l.title: Length
l.description:
Number of components in the value arrays.
If present values will be truncated or expanded to match this length when accessed from expressions.

x.title: X
x.description:
Time component:
0 means start time of the keyframe,
1 means time of the next keyframe.

y.title: Y
y.description:
Value interpolation component:
0 means start value of the keyframe,
1 means value at the next keyframe.

keyframe-base.title: Keyframe
keyframe-base.description: A Keyframes specifies the value at a specific time and the interpolation function to reach the next keyframe.

i.title: In Tangent
i.description: Easing tangent going into the next keyframe

o.title: Out Tangent
o.description: Easing tangent leaving the current keyframe

keyframe.title: Keyframe
keyframe.description: A Keyframes specifies the value at a specific time and the interpolation function to reach the next keyframe.

s.title: Value
s.description: Value at this keyframe. Note the if the property is a scalar, keyframe values are still represented as arrays

e.title: End value
e.description: Value at the end of the keyframe, note that this is deprecated and you should use `s` from the next keyframe to get this value

i.title: In Tangent
i.description: Easing tangent going into the next keyframe

o.title: Out Tangent
o.description: Easing tangent leaving the current keyframe

shape-property.title: Shape Property
shape-property.description: An animatable property that holds a Bezier

gradient-colors.title: Gradient Colors
gradient-colors.description:
Represents colors and offsets in a gradient

Colors are represented as a flat list interleaving offsets and color components in weird ways
There are two possible layouts:

Without alpha, the colors are a sequence of offset, r, g, b

With alpha, same as above but at the end of the list there is a sequence of offset, alpha

color-value.title: Color Value
color-value.description: An animatable property that holds a Color

g.title: Generator
g.description: Software used to generate the file

animation.title: Animation
animation.description: Top level object, describing the animation

ip.title: In Point
ip.description: "In Point", which frame the animation starts at (usually 0)

op.title: Out Point
op.description: "Out Point", which frame the animation stops/loops at, which makes this the duration in frames when `ip` is 0

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: List of assets that can be referenced by layers

comps.title: Extra Compositions
comps.description: List of Extra compositions not referenced by anything

chars.title: Chars
chars.description: Data defining text characters as lottie shapes. If present a player might only render characters defined here and nothing else.

markers.title: Markers
markers.description: Markers defining named sections of the composition.

t.title: Type
t.description: Marks as part of an image sequence if present

precomposition.title: Precomposition
precomposition.description: Asset containing an animation that can be referenced by layers.

id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier used by layers when referencing this asset

u.title: Path
u.description: Path to the directory containing a file

data-source.title: Data source
data-source.description: External data source, usually a JSON file

shape-direction.title: ShapeDirection
shape-direction.description: Drawing direction of the shape curve, useful for trim path

mask-mode.title: MaskMode
mask-mode.description: How masks interact with each other. See https://helpx.adobe.com/after-effects/using/alpha-channels-masks-mattes.html

fill-rule.title: FillRule
fill-rule.description: Rule used to handle multiple shapes rendered with the same fill object

oneOf.title: Non Zero
oneOf.description: Everything is colored (You can think of this as an OR)

oneOf.title: Even Odd
oneOf.description: Colored based on intersections and path direction, can be used to create "holes"

trim-multiple-shapes.title: TrimMultipleShapes
trim-multiple-shapes.description: How to handle multiple shapes in trim path

line-join.title: LineJoin
line-join.description: Style at a sharp corner of a stoked line

line-cap.title: LineCap
line-cap.description: Style at the end of a stoked line

stroke-dash-type.title: StrokeDashType
stroke-dash-type.description: Type of a dash item in a stroked line

composite.title: Composite
composite.description: How to stack copies in a repeater

matte-mode.title: MatteMode
matte-mode.description: How a layer should mask another layer

custom-effect.title: Custom Effect
custom-effect.description: Some lottie files use `ty` = 5 for many different effects

prefixItems.title: Black Color
prefixItems.description: Tint of the darker parts of the layer

prefixItems.title: White Color
prefixItems.description: Tint of the lighter parts of the layer

prefixItems.title: Intensity
prefixItems.description: Intensity of the effect, 0 means the layer is unchanged. 100 means full effect

fill-effect.title: Fill Effect
fill-effect.description: Replaces the whole layer with the given color

tritone-effect.title: Tritone Effect
tritone-effect.description: Maps layers colors based on bright/mid/dark colors

drop-shadow-effect.title: Drop Shadow Effect
drop-shadow-effect.description: Adds a shadow to the layer

color.title: Color
color.description: Color as a [r, g, b] array with values in [0, 1]

int-boolean.title: Integer Boolean
int-boolean.description: Represents boolean values as an integer. 0 is false, 1 is true.

i.title: In Tangents
i.description:
Array of points, each point is an array of coordinates.
These points are along the `in` tangents relative to the corresponding `v`.

o.title: Out Tangents
o.description:
Array of points, each point is an array of coordinates.
These points are along the `out` tangents relative to the corresponding `v`.

v.title: Vertices
v.description:
Array of points, each point is an array of coordinates.
These points are along the bezier path

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Bezier shape used to mask/clip a layer

a.title: Anchor Point
a.description: Anchor point: a position (relative to its parent) around which transformations are applied (ie: center for rotation / scale)

sk.title: Skew
sk.description: Skew amount as an angle in degrees

sa.title: Skew Axis
sa.description: Direction along which skew is applied, in degrees (`0` skews along the X axis, `90` along the Y axis)

rz.title: Z Rotation
rz.description: Split rotation component, equivalent to `r` when not split

marker.title: Marker
marker.description: Defines named portions of the composition.

nm.title: Name
nm.description: Name, as seen from editors and the like

refId.title: Sound Id
refId.description: ID of the sound as specified in the assets

pe.title: Perspective
pe.description:
Distance from the Z=0 plane.
Small values yield a higher perspective effect.

ind.title: Index
ind.description: Index that can be used for parenting and referenced in expressions

parent.title: Parent Index
parent.description: Must be the `ind` property of another layer

ip.title: In Point
ip.description: Frame when the layer becomes visible

op.title: Out Point
op.description: Frame when the layer becomes invisible

cl.title: CSS Class
cl.description: CSS class used by the SVG renderer

ln.title: Layer XML ID
ln.description: `id` attribute used by the SVG renderer

tg.title: Layer XML tag name
tg.description: tag name used by the SVG renderer

null-layer.title: Null Layer
null-layer.description: Layer with no data, useful to group layers together

visual-layer.title: Visual Layer
visual-layer.description: Layer used to affect visual elements

ao.title: Auto Orient
ao.description: If 1, The layer will rotate itself to match its animated position path

hasMask.title: Has Masks
hasMask.description: Whether the layer has masks applied

mb.title: Motion Blur
mb.description: Whether motion blur is enabled for the layer

precomposition-layer.title: Precomposition Layer
precomposition-layer.description: Layer that renders a Precomposition asset

refId.title: Reference Id
refId.description: ID of the precomp as specified in the assets

refId.title: Data source Id
refId.description: ID of the data source in assets

image-layer.title: Image Layer
image-layer.description: Layer that shows an image asset

refId.title: Image Id
refId.description: ID of the image as specified in the assets

solid-color-layer.title: Solid Color Layer
solid-color-layer.description: Layer with a solid color rectangle

sc.title: Color
sc.description: Color of the layer, unlike most other places, the color is a `#rrggbb` hex string

stroke-dash.title: Stroke Dash
stroke-dash.description: An item used to described the dashe pattern in a stroked path

pucker-bloat.title: Pucker Bloat
pucker-bloat.description: Interpolates the shape with its center point and bezier tangents with the opposite direction

h.title: Highlight Length
h.description: Highlight Length, as a percentage between `s` and `e`

a.title: Highlight Angle
a.description: Highlight Angle, relative to the direction from `s` to `e`

repeater-transform.title: Repeater Transform
repeater-transform.description: Transform used by a repeater, the transform is applied to each subsequent repeated object.

so.title: Start Opacity
so.description: Opacity of the first repeated object.

eo.title: End Opacity
eo.description: Opacity of the last repeated object.

d.title: Direction
d.description: Direction the shape is drawn as, mostly relevant when using trim path

repeater.title: Repeater
repeater.description: Duplicates previous shapes in a group

shape-element.title: Shape Element
shape-element.description: Base class for all elements of ShapeLayer and Group

cl.title: CSS Class
cl.description: CSS class used by the SVG renderer

ln.title: Layer XML ID
ln.description: `id` attribute used by the SVG renderer

group.title: Group
group.description: Shape Element that can contain other shapes

zig-zag.title: Zig Zags
zig-zag.description: Changes the edges of affected shapes into a series of peaks and valleys of uniform size

offset-path.title: Offset Path
offset-path.description: Interpolates the shape with its center point and bezier tangents with the opposite direction

sy.title: Star Type
sy.description: Star type, `1` for Star, `2` for Polygon

no-style.title: No Style
no-style.description: Represents a style for shapes without fill or stroke

masked-path.title: Masked Path
masked-path.description: Uses the path described by a layer mask to put the text on said path.

m.title: Mask
m.description: Index of the mask to use

font.title: Font
font.description: Describes how a font with given settings should be loaded

ascent.title: Ascent
ascent.description: Text will be moved down based on this value

fName.title: Name
fName.description: Name used by text documents to reference this font, usually it's `fFamily` followed by `fStyle`

fClass.title: CSS Class
fClass.description: CSS Class applied to text objects using this font

character-precomp.title: Character Precomp
character-precomp.description: Defines a character as a precomp layer

refId.title: Reference Id
refId.description: ID of the precomp as specified in the assets

ip.title: In Point
ip.description: Frame when the layer becomes visible

op.title: Out Point
op.description: Frame when the layer becomes invisible

lh.title: Line Height
lh.description: Distance between lines on multiline or wrapped text

sz.title: Wrap Size
sz.description: Size of the box containing the text

ps.title: Wrap Position
ps.description: Position of the box containing the text

t.title: Text
t.description: Text, note that newlines are encoded with \r

text-data.title: Text Data
text-data.description: Animated property representing the text contents

text-data-keyframe.title: Text Data Keyframe
text-data-keyframe.description: A keyframe containing a text document
